attributes.action:
Revise the house-buying process in England.
Provide a transparent portal
attributes.additional_details:
To provide a portal for buyers/sellers/solicitors and estate agents  that is transparent and at a glance you can view what is outstanding in the chain. This way you will not get mis-communication and estimated time frames for all involved. This will also help the purchasing of a house less stressful to most individuals. 

On top of providing a portal for all parties ,make it illegal to gazump in England.
attributes.background:
To provide a portal for buyers/sellers/solicitors and estate agents  that is transparent and at a glance you can view what is outstanding in the chain. This way you will not get mis-communication!

On top of providing a portal for all parties ,make it illegal to gazump in England.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for solicitors and estate agents, or bodies such as the Law Society, to decide. 

You might like to sign this petition about contracts 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596460
